txt.en: The symbol of vengeance that has driven the Boar-tribe Orcs hangs from a crudely put together totem. You should take the skull and bring it to Cútha in Beaconwatch.
Collect the Great Boar of Everholt's skull
The symbol of vengeance that has driven the Boar-tribe Orcs hangs from a crudely put together totem. You should take the skull and bring it to Cútha in Beaconwatch.
Collect the Great Boar of Everholt's skull
Collected the Great Boar of Everholt's skull
While you are in the lair of the Boar-tribe Orcs, you should remove the skull of the Boar of Everholt and bring it to Beaconwatch.
You have taken the Boar of Everholt's skull from the Boar-tribe.

You have reclaimed the Boar of Everholt's skull. The Orcs were worshipping it, driven by their hatred of Folca King and extending their ire to his descendents as well.\n\nThis will be a nice decoration for the Mead Hall of Beaconwatch.
The symbol of vengeance that has driven the Boar-tribe Orcs hangs from a crudely put together totem. You should take the skull and bring it to Cútha in Beaconwatch.
